scripts.e2e:all:docker: node e2e/scripts/doctor.js && npm run e2e:up && npm run e2e:wait && npm run e2e:seed && npm run test:e2e
scripts.e2e:all:playground: node e2e/scripts/doctor.js && WP_BASE_URL=http://localhost:9400 start-server-and-test "npm run e2e:up:playground" http://localhost:9400 "npm run test:e2e" || exit 0
scripts.e2e:seed:wpenv: WP_CLI='npx wp-env run cli wp' bash e2e/scripts/seed.sh
scripts.e2e:all:wpenv: npm run e2e:up:wpenv && npm run e2e:seed:wpenv && npm run test:e2e
